snippet.title: Claustrophobia V1.1 Walkthrough
snippet.description:
Just an update on the walkthrough for my mod, since I updated it recently and did some semi-major changes to some areas and whatnot. It also got a proper name changer in it's update, in case any of you were wondering. It is free to play now as well as I modified it to only use Source SDK Base 2007, you no longer need Half-Life 2 and its episodes.

Download:

http://www.moddb.com/mods/hl2-claustrophobia/downloads/claustrophobia-v11

Or

https://www.dropbox.com/s/nvt0nypjxjcweb4/Claustrophobia.rar?dl=0

0:02 Chapter 1: Onyx St. Sewer
05:04 Chapter 2: Wickland Mental Hospital
08:27 Chapter 3: Reactor
13:10 Chapter 4: Déjà vu
15:30 Chapter 5: Metro Subway
22:59 Chapter 6: Metro Subway Tunnels
29:03 Chapter 7: Canals
34:00 Chapter 8: Canyon
